Is_Positive: The hotel was very nice and clean. Very friendly and professional staff. In addition the breakfast was petty good for the price.
I stayed for 2 weeks in amsterdam for quite a good price. We had a room with nice view of the city. I would recommend this hotel to friends and family
Don't go to this hotel. The room wasn't clean the moment we got the keys. The worst part is the smell of the bed. absolutle disgusting
